resources.string:
"Chem: ntawm Ac mus Zr v1.0.0
Alex Doan Daniel Kinney Robert Valladares John Paul tug txiv nees TAYLOR Veith Victoria Rivas
Tswv yim rau next:
Chav tsev Converter
Xaiv conversion hom ntawm tus tshuab raj nco-down thawj Xaiv koj los - los rau lwm thawj zaug los nias txoj kev nco-down menus Sau tus nqi xauj yuav hloov ua lwm yam thaum lub hauv qab thiab nias "Calculate" No yog tso tawm kom pom nyob rau hauv "Calculate" khawm
Cov nrhiav
Xaiv tebchaw dlhau theem teev tseg los yog mus nrhiav ntawm qhov bar rau saum Yuav mus nrhiav ntawm cov mis los sis cov lub npe Yog los ntawm mis searching: * Nrhiav yog nab rhiab! * Tsis txhob hnov qab quas yog nyob hauv cov mis Yog searching uas muaj cov npe: * Pib typing lub npe txog * Xaiv tus compound ntawm daim ntawv generated Xaiv ib compound rau conversion ntawm grams los moles
Ntsiab
Ntsiab dlhau theem teev tseg rau hauv daim ntawv los ntawm lub atomic naj npawb Hais rau saum qhov tshuaj ntsuam nrhiav npe Xaiv ib lub caij ntxiv thiab conversion ntawm grams los moles
Cov lus Periodic
Cov lus yuav tso tau rau hauv toj roob hauv pes - rotate saib koj xov tooj! Zoom rau cov zaub ua dab tsi"
Muaj lus nug, suggestion, lossis kab qhia? Qhia rau peb paub hauv qab no.
qhov no yog lub thawv rau qhov txaws screen
thawv rau tsev tshuaj ntsuam logo
